name: Brightmont Academy (Deer Valley)
overview: Brightmont Academy is a fully accredited private school that provides one-to-one instruction. One experienced teacher works with one student throughout every learning session. This research-based approach has been proven to deliver the best learning results. Teachers cover academic and study skills each student needs to be a successful learner. Students can enroll full-time to earn a high school diploma, take a 6th- to 12th-grade individual course for credit, or receive individualized tutoring for all K-12 subjects, study skills, and test prep. Advanced Placement, summer school, special needs and learning disability programs available as well. Brightmont Academy has served thousands of students since 1999 and has campuses in Arizona, California, and Washington. Get in touch with one of our Campus Directors to discuss how we can help with your child’s educational needs.
